result.title: Former Security Lead for Tesla's Gigafactory Network Joins The Nuclear Company
result.text: WASHINGTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The Nuclear Company, which is leading gigawatt-scale deployment of nuclear power across America and pioneering the modernization of nuclear construction, today announced the hiring of Mike Marty as Vice President, Security. A decorated U.S. Marine Corps veteran and global security leader, Marty brings more than two decades of experience protecting some of the most complex operations in the world, including Tesla's sprawling Gigafactory network.
